title: Ghost List Exposed
outcome: Citizens discover Congress leaders are secretly maintaining exclusion lists, echoing the old BCI's logic. Exclusion spreads outrage. Oksana reveals the truth, unleashing mob protests and forcing a reckoning with the city’s cycle of surveillance and manipulation.

events.description: Rumors spread that Congress leaders are secretly updating exclusion lists similar to BCI blacklists. Some citizens report being quietly denied aid or entry to key resources.
A document exposing the existence of the new 'ghost list' leaks online. Outrage erupts as people realize the Congress is quietly repeating BCI-era exclusions under a different name.
Crowds mobilize outside Congress offices, demanding transparency and accountability. Oksana publishes evidence that Congress members drove these exclusions to maintain control over rival districts.

Mass protests force emergency Congress hearings streamed citywide. Under pressure, Congress admits guilt and promises reforms, but trust is shattered as citizens accuse leaders of simply rebranding oppression.

Inspired by the protests, communities submit proposals to destroy all central exclusion records, seeking a radical break from every form of surveillance. Debate spreads citywide over how to truly dismantle the logic of the BCI era.
